quote: I look at the others, simpering courtiers and visiting dignitaries, all unsuspecting of what is to come. A merciful man should spare them, but I had mercy cut out of me at a young age.
quote_letters: I LOOK AT THE OTHERS SIMPERING COURTIERS AND VISITING DIGNITARIES ALL UNSUSPECTING OF WHAT IS TO COME A MERCIFUL MAN SHOULD SPARE THEM BUT I HAD MERCY CUT OUT OF ME AT A YOUNG AGE
